posts.post_content:
Eight PSA graded little "monster" reindeers are offered individually or in groups of any size.  These would make great stocking stuffers for your significant other or simply let them do the shopping with your help, or of course you can stuff your own stocking.  I wont tell.;)

Leading the pack is Rudolph without a red nose (PSA 4) for $58

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10562/rudolph[/IMG]

Next would be the one horse open Schlei with bat (PSA 4) for $58  PENDING

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10565/schlei-batting[/IMG]

Third would be silent Knight, the portrait (PSA 4) for $58  PENDING

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10456/knight-portrait[/IMG]

Fourth, from the North Pole, Raymond with a Polar Bear back (PSA 3) for $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10557/raymond-pb[/IMG]

Fifth is Ho Ho Hannifan with a Sovereign 350 reverse (PSA 3) for $44

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10436/hannafin-sov[/IMG]

Sixth is Snodgrass Cratchiting - "Bah Humbug" (PSA 3) for $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10579/snodgrass-catching[/IMG]

Seventh is "Connect the Dots" Miller (PSA 3) for $38

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10479/miller-d[/IMG]

Eighth is Pfeister or Pfiester "Famine" sitting in a (PSA 2) holder for $31

Please note this is the dual flip variation with both spellings :eek::eek::eek:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10553/pfeister-sitting[/IMG]

All prices include shipping and exclude a modest Paypal surcharge if you prefer regular Paypal, but let's be friends and family and don't forget to deck your halls with boughs of Foley, 

Fa la la la la

La la la la    :D

Seven remain.

I will buy the Snodgrass card for $38. Please send my your PP F/F email.
 Thanks 
James

Four day bump
Four cards sold
Four remain

Rudolph
Hannifan
Miller
Pfeister

Four gone conclusion that these will not last.;)
